scripts.build: npm run build:compile && npm run tslint
scripts.build:full: npm run build:full:compile && npm run tslint
scripts.docker-restart: docker-compose restart gateway && docker-compose restart alfred && docker-compose restart deli && docker-compose restart scriptorium && docker-compose restart foreman && docker-compose restart paparazzi
scripts.postinstall: (npm run registryAuth || true) && lerna bootstrap --hoist --nohoist tslint-microsoft-contrib
scripts.rush:repair: git clean -Xfd && pushd ./common/tools && npm i && popd && perl ./common/scripts/update-rush-json.pl > ./rush.json && npm run rush:update
scripts.test:full: npm run test:coverage;t1=$?;npm run test:copyresults; exit $t1
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:tsc" "npm run watch:esnext" "npm run watch:webpack"
scripts.use:rush: git clean -Xdf && (npm run registryAuth || true) && cd common/tools && npm install && cd ../.. && npm run rush:install
